Class DashedDrawStrategy

Namespace
ASE_Application_Demo
Assembly
ASE Application Demo.dll

Provides drawing operations for basic shapes and text using a dashed line strategy. Implements the IDrawStrategy interface to define how shapes and text are drawn on the canvas with dashed lines.

public class DashedDrawStrategy : IDrawStrategy
Inheritance
object
DashedDrawStrategy
Implements
IDrawStrategy

Methods

DrawCircle(Graphics, Pen, int, int, int, bool)

Draws a circle on the canvas using the specified parameters. The circle can be either filled or outlined with a dashed line based on the filled parameter.

public void DrawCircle(Graphics graphics, Pen pen, int xPos, int yPos, int radius, bool filled)

Parameters

graphics Graphics

The graphics object used for drawing.

pen Pen

The pen used to draw the circle outline.

xPos int

The x-coordinate of the circle's center.

yPos int

The y-coordinate of the circle's center.

radius int

The radius of the circle.

filled bool

Determines whether the circle is filled with color.

DrawRectangle(Graphics, Pen, int, int, int, int, bool)

Draws a rectangle on the canvas using the specified parameters. The rectangle can be either filled or outlined with a dashed line based on the filled parameter.

public void DrawRectangle(Graphics graphics, Pen pen, int xPos, int yPos, int width, int height, bool filled)

Parameters

graphics Graphics

The graphics object used for drawing.

pen Pen

The pen used to draw the rectangle outline.

xPos int

The x-coordinate of the rectangle's top-left corner.

yPos int

The y-coordinate of the rectangle's top-left corner.

width int

The width of the rectangle.

height int

The height of the rectangle.

filled bool

Determines whether the rectangle is filled with color.

DrawText(Graphics, Pen, int, int, string)

Draws text on the canvas at the specified location. The text is drawn using the specified pen color.

public void DrawText(Graphics graphics, Pen pen, int xPos, int yPos, string text)

Parameters

graphics Graphics

The graphics object used for drawing.

pen Pen

The pen used to set the color of the text.

xPos int

The x-coordinate where the text should be drawn.

yPos int

The y-coordinate where the text should be drawn.

text string

The text string to be drawn.

DrawTriangle(Graphics, Pen, int, int, int, int)

Draws a triangle on the canvas using the specified parameters. The triangle is outlined with a dashed line.

public void DrawTriangle(Graphics graphics, Pen pen, int xPos, int yPos, int width, int height)

Parameters

graphics Graphics

The graphics object used for drawing.

pen Pen

The pen used to draw the outline of the triangle.

xPos int

The x-coordinate of the triangle's base left corner.

yPos int

The y-coordinate of the triangle's base left corner.

width int

The width of the triangle's base.

height int

The height of the triangle.
